detaileddescription.para:
Open a new source on this player.
obj
the player
filename
file to open.
cb
a callback used to notify end of play.
user_data
a user-data provided in the callback to help the application to retrieve its context.
0 if successful, -1 otherwise

Start a play operation. The player must have been open previously with sephone_player_open().
obj
the player.
0 if successful, -1 otherwise

Suspend a play operation. The player must have been started previously with sephone_player_start().
obj
the player.
0 if successful, -1 otherwise

Seek at a given position given in milliseconds. The player must be in the paused state.
obj
the player.
time_ms
the position to seek to.
0 if successful, -1 otherwise

Get the state of play operation.
obj
the player.
the state of the player within MSPlayerClosed, MSPlayerStarted, MSPlayerPaused.

Get the duration of the media
obj
the player
The duration in milliseconds

Get the position of the playback
obj
the player
Position of the playback in milliseconds

Close the player.
obj
the player.
